projects.name: Doo-Durian
projects.details: Doo-Durian is an AI-powered chatbot developed to support durian farmers and enthusiasts with smart agricultural assistance. It combines real-time weather updates, disease diagnosis, and durian market insights into one convenient platform accessible via LINE projects.name: P’Saendee
projects.details: P’Saendee is an advisory chatbot that provides guidance to high school students on project development and innovation.

technologies.details: Git, Docker, GitHub, VSCode, Unity, Postman, Android Studio, Flutter, Roblox Studio, blender

workExperiences & Contest.company: National Electronics and Computer Technology Center (NECTEC)
details: Independently developed UpMath, an AI-powered platform that enables teachers to generate math problems for students, covering dataset collection, model fine-tuning, and website development
Acted as an advisor to other student interns, offering technical guidance and support
Served as a teaching assistant (TA) in various training sessions and workshops
Developed in-game building and environment models
provided player support. Conducted user research to understand player needs and managed the game community
Presented the Doo-Durian project to raise public awareness and seek funding support for further development.
Gained valuable experience and new knowledge about innovation, including exposure to cutting-edge technologies.
